dcterms:creator: G. H. Darú
dcterms:description: A comprehensive collection of 153,445 items showcasing a diverse array of retail products, meticulously categorized into various segments, including detailed classifications such as item name, segment, category, subcategory, and product name. This dataset is specific to the Brazilian market, making it particularly relevant for analyzing retail trends and patterns in Brazil.
dcterms:title: Classificação Produtos Varejo CPG PTBR
